# Security & Compliance Checklists

## General

- [ ] OAuth2 / OIDC integration
- [ ] RBAC / ABAC policies
- [ ] Secrets stored in Vault/KMS
- [ ] Audit logging enabled

## Zero Trust

- [ ] Service identity (SPIFFE/SPIRE)
- [ ] mTLS enforced
- [ ] Policy decisions logged

## Compliance

- [ ] SBOM attached
- [ ] Provenance artifact verified
- [ ] Privacy impact assessment updated
